meanings.definition: A person or machine that sorts items into categories.
meanings.sent1: The sorters at the post office organize letters by destination.
meanings.sent2: The library sorters arrange books by genre for easy access.
meanings.sent3: The sorters in the toy store made sure all the puzzles were in the right boxes.
meanings.sent4: Watching the sorters at work was like observing a well-oiled machine in action.
meanings.sent5: The efficiency of the sorters impressed everyone in the warehouse.

meanings.sent1: The sorters in the classroom helped distribute papers to the students.
meanings.sent2: The team of sorters quickly organized the files alphabetically.
meanings.sent3: The sorters in the game were responsible for dividing the players into teams.
meanings.sent4: The sorters lined up the packages like soldiers ready for delivery.
meanings.sent5: The group of sorters worked together seamlessly to complete the task.
